mapper.select: select consult_time_id, ev_expo_id, cust_id, consult_from_dt, consult_to_dt, tiemzone_cd, consult_from_time, consult_to_time , case when tiemzone_cd = '213001' then (select cd_nm from ev_comm_code ecc where cd_id = ect.consult_from_time) when tiemzone_cd = '213002' then (select cd_val1 from ev_comm_code ecc where cd_id = ect.consult_from_time) when tiemzone_cd = '213003' then (select cd_val2 from ev_comm_code ecc where cd_id = ect.consult_from_time) when tiemzone_cd = '213004' then (select cd_val3 from ev_comm_code ecc where cd_id = ect.consult_from_time) end as timezone_hhmm_fr , case when tiemzone_cd = '213001' then (select cd_nm from ev_comm_code ecc where cd_id = ect.consult_to_time) when tiemzone_cd = '213002' then (select cd_val1 from ev_comm_code ecc where cd_id = ect.consult_to_time) when tiemzone_cd = '213003' then (select cd_val2 from ev_comm_code ecc where cd_id = ect.consult_to_time) when tiemzone_cd = '213004' then (select cd_val3 from ev_comm_code ecc where cd_id = ect.consult_to_time) end as timezone_hhmm_to from ev_consult_time ect where cust_id = #{cust_id} and ev_expo_id = #{ev_expo_id}
mapper.insert: /* 상담스케줄생성 */ INSERT INTO ev_consult_schedule ( schedule_id , ev_expo_id , consult_time_id , consult_dt , consult_time_cd , consult_rsv_cust_id , consult_avail_yn , del_yn , ins_user , ins_dtm , mod_user , mod_dtm ) /*https://nakanara.tistory.com/255*/ with recursive DT_CNT as ( select DATEDIFF(STR_TO_DATE((SELECT consult_to_dt FROM ev_consult_time WHERE consult_time_id = #{consult_time_id}), '%Y-%m-%d') , STR_TO_DATE((SELECT consult_from_dt FROM ev_consult_time WHERE consult_time_id = #{consult_time_id}), '%Y-%m-%d')) as cnt ), DT_TABLE as ( select STR_TO_DATE((SELECT consult_from_dt FROM ev_consult_time WHERE consult_time_id = #{consult_time_id}), '%Y-%m-%d') as dt , 1 as lv from dual union all select DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE((SELECT consult_from_dt FROM ev_consult_time WHERE consult_time_id = #{consult_time_id}), '%Y-%m-%d'), interval DT_TABLE.lv day) as dt , DT_TABLE.lv + 1 as lv from DT_CNT, DT_TABLE where DT_TABLE.lv <= dt_cnt.cnt ) SELECT null /* schedule_id */ , #{ev_expo_id} , #{consult_time_id} /* consult_time_id */ , b.dt AS consult_dt , a.cd_id AS consult_time_cd , '' AS consult_rsv_cust_id , (case when (SELECT 1 FROM ev_consult_time WHERE consult_time_id = #{consult_time_id} and a.cd_id between consult_from_time and consult_to_time) = 1 then 'Y' else 'N' end) AS consult_avail_yn , 'N' AS del_yn , #{user_id} AS ins_user , NOW() AS ins_dtm , #{user_id} AS mod_user , NOW() AS mod_dtm FROM ev_comm_code a , DT_TABLE b WHERE upper_cd_id = '214000' AND use_yn = 'Y' and not exists (SELECT 1 FROM ev_consult_schedule WHERE consult_time_id = #{consult_time_id} and consult_dt = b.dt )

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as consult_time_id
/* 상담스케줄 변경 시 생성 */ INSERT INTO ev_consult_schedule ( schedule_id , ev_expo_id , consult_time_id , consult_dt , consult_time_cd , consult_rsv_cust_id , consult_avail_yn , consult_rsv_stat_cd , remarks , del_yn , ins_user , ins_dtm , mod_user , mod_dtm ) select null schedule_id , ev_expo_id , consult_time_id , consult_dt , consult_time_cd , #{consult_rsv_cust_id} as consult_rsv_cust_id , #{consult_avail_yn} as consult_avail_yn , #{consult_rsv_stat_cd} as consult_rsv_stat_cd , #{remarks} as remarks , 'N' del_yn , #{user_id} , NOW() , #{user_id} , NOW() from ev_consult_schedule where schedule_id = #{schedule_id}
mapper.select: select ecs.schedule_id , ecm.cust_id , ecm.cust_nm , nvl(ecm.hp_no, ecm.tel_no) as tel_no from ev_consult_schedule ecs , ev_cust_mst ecm where ecs.consult_rsv_cust_id = ecm.cust_id and ecs.schedule_id = #{schedule_id}

select ecm.consult_msg_id , ecm.consult_time_id , ecm.schedule_id , ecm.snd_cust_id , ecm.rcv_cust_id , ecm.message , ecm.rcv_yn , ecm.ins_user , DATE_FORMAT(ecm.ins_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as ins_dtm from ev_consult_msg ecm where ecm.consult_time_id = #{consult_time_id} and ( (ecm.snd_cust_id = trim(#{snd_cust_id}) and ecm.rcv_cust_id = trim(#{rcv_cust_id})) or (ecm.snd_cust_id = trim(#{rcv_cust_id}) and ecm.rcv_cust_id = trim(#{snd_cust_id})) ) order by ecm.ins_dtm asc

select ( select count(*) from ev_consult_msg ecm where consult_time_id = #{consult_time_id} and (snd_cust_id = #{cust_id} or rcv_cust_id = #{cust_id}) ) as chat_cnt , ( select count(*) from ev_consult_schedule ecs where consult_time_id = #{consult_time_id} and consult_rsv_cust_id is not null and consult_rsv_cust_id != '' and del_yn = 'N' and consult_rsv_stat_cd in ('215001','215002') ) as consult_cnt , ( select (count(*) * 30)/60 from ev_consult_schedule ecs where consult_time_id = #{consult_time_id} and consult_rsv_cust_id is not null and consult_rsv_cust_id != '' and del_yn = 'N' and consult_rsv_stat_cd in ('215001','215002') ) as consult_time

with cd as ( select nvl(cd_val1,'0') as cd_val1 , nvl(cd_id,'213001') as cd_id from ev_cust_mst ecm , ev_comm_code ecc where ecm.cust_id = #{cust_id} and ecm.tiemzone_cd = ecc.cd_id ) select ecs.schedule_id , ect.ev_expo_id , ect.consult_time_id , ecm.cust_id as consult_cust_id , ecm.cust_nm as consult_cust_nm /* , ecs.consult_dt */ , ( date_format( date_add( str_to_date( concat(replace(ecs.consult_dt,'-',''), replace((select cd_nm from ev_comm_code where cd_id = ecs.consult_time_cd),':','')) , '%Y%m%d%H%i') ,interval nvl(cd.cd_val1,'0') hour) ,'%Y-%m-%d') ) as consult_dt , ecs.consult_time_cd , (select case when cd.cd_id = '213001' then cd_nm when cd.cd_id = '213002' then cd_val1 when cd.cd_id = '213003' then cd_val2 when cd.cd_id = '213004' then cd_val3 end from ev_comm_code ecc where cd_id = ecs.consult_time_cd) as consult_time_nm /* , (select cd_nm from ev_comm_code ecc where cd_id = ecs.consult_time_cd) as consult_time_nm */ , ecs.consult_avail_yn , ecs.consult_rsv_stat_cd from ev_consult_schedule ecs , ev_consult_time ect , ev_cust_mst ecm , cd where ecs.consult_time_id = ect.consult_time_id and ect.cust_id = ecm.cust_id and ecs.consult_rsv_cust_id = #{cust_id} and ecs.consult_rsv_stat_cd in ('215001','215002') and ecs.del_yn = 'N' order by consult_dt asc, consult_time_nm asc

select ecs.schedule_id , ecm.cust_id , ecm.cust_nm , nvl(ecm.hp_no, ecm.tel_no) as tel_no , ecs.consult_rsv_stat_cd from ev_consult_schedule ecs , ev_consult_time ect , ev_cust_mst ecm where ecs.consult_time_id = ect.consult_time_id and ect.cust_id = ecm.cust_id and ecs.schedule_id = #{schedule_id}

select ecm.consult_msg_id , ecm.consult_time_id , ecm.schedule_id , ecm.snd_cust_id , ecm.rcv_cust_id , ecm.message , ecm.rcv_yn , ecm.ins_user , DATE_FORMAT(ecm.ins_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as ins_dtm from ev_consult_msg ecm , ev_consult_time ect where ecm.consult_time_id = ect.consult_time_id and ect.ev_expo_id = #{ev_expo_id} and ( (ecm.snd_cust_id = trim(#{snd_cust_id}) and ecm.rcv_cust_id = trim(#{rcv_cust_id})) or (ecm.snd_cust_id = trim(#{rcv_cust_id}) and ecm.rcv_cust_id = trim(#{snd_cust_id})) ) order by ecm.ins_dtm asc

with cd as ( select nvl(cd_val1,'0') as cd_val1 , nvl(cd_id,'213001') as cd_id from ev_cust_mst ecm , ev_comm_code ecc where ecm.cust_id = #{consult_rsv_cust_id} and ecm.tiemzone_cd = ecc.cd_id ) select ecs.schedule_id , ect.ev_expo_id , ect.consult_time_id , ect.cust_id /*, ecs.consult_dt*/ , ( date_format( date_add( str_to_date( concat(replace(ecs.consult_dt,'-',''), replace((select cd_nm from ev_comm_code where cd_id = ecs.consult_time_cd),':','')) , '%Y%m%d%H%i') ,interval nvl(cd.cd_val1,'0') hour) ,'%Y-%m-%d') ) as consult_dt , ecs.consult_time_cd , (select case when cd.cd_id = '213001' then cd_nm when cd.cd_id = '213002' then cd_val1 when cd.cd_id = '213003' then cd_val2 when cd.cd_id = '213004' then cd_val3 end from ev_comm_code ecc where cd_id = ecs.consult_time_cd) as consult_time_nm , ecs.consult_avail_yn , case when ecs.consult_avail_yn = 'N' then '' else ecs.consult_rsv_cust_id end as consult_rsv_cust_id , case when ecs.consult_avail_yn = 'N' then '' else ecm.cust_nm end as consult_rsv_cust_nm , case when ecs.consult_avail_yn = 'N' then '' else ecs.consult_rsv_stat_cd end as consult_rsv_stat_cd , case when ecs.consult_avail_yn = 'N' then '' else nvl(ecm.hp_no, ecm.tel_no) end as tel_no from ev_consult_schedule ecs left outer join ev_cust_mst ecm on ecs.consult_rsv_cust_id = ecm.cust_id , ev_consult_time ect , cd where ecs.consult_time_id = ect.consult_time_id
and ect.consult_time_id = #{consult_time_id} and ect.ev_expo_id = #{ev_expo_id} and (ecs.consult_avail_yn = 'Y' or ecs.consult_time_cd between ect.consult_from_time and ect.consult_to_time)
and nvl(ecs.consult_rsv_stat_cd,'') in ('','215001','215002') and ecs.del_yn = 'N' order by consult_time_nm asc

WITH RECURSIVE STDT as ( select DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(expo_consult_from_dt, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(expo_consult_from_dt, '%Y-%m-%d'),'%w') * -1 DAY) as ST_DT , expo_consult_to_dt as END_DT from ev_expo where use_yn = 'Y' ) , DT_TABLE AS ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(STDT.ST_DT,'%m/%d (%a)') dt, STDT.ST_DT, 1 lv FROM STDT UNION all SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(STDT.ST_DT, INTERVAL DT_TABLE.lv+6 DAY),'%m/%d (%a)') dt , DATE_ADD(STDT.ST_DT, INTERVAL DT_TABLE.lv+6 DAY) ST_DT , DT_TABLE.lv+7 AS lv FROM DT_TABLE, STDT WHERE DT_TABLE.lv <= 180 ) SELECT DT_TABLE.dt as sunday_fm, DT_TABLE.st_dt as sunday FROM DT_TABLE, STDT where DT_TABLE.st_dt <= STDT.END_DT
